title.rendered: Software Development Apprenticeship at Automotive Mastermind, Gurgaon [12 months; React; Angular; C#]: Apply by March 31

content.rendered:
Applications are invited for the Software Development Apprenticeship at Automotive Mastermind, Gurgaon. The application deadline is March 31, 2025!

About Automotive Mastermind

Since 2012, automotiveMastermind has revolutionized the data mining sector, moving beyond traditional lead generation by utilizing machine learning to help dealers predict when customers are likely to enter the market, why they are doing so, and what they are likely looking for. The company has continuously evolved, adapting to the needs of dealers and OEMs to address their challenges and deliver the solutions necessary for success.

Today, as a trusted data and technology provider in the automotive industry, automotiveMastermind is enhancing the features of its core Mastermind product. It is also expanding its integration strategy, connecting with major DMS, CRM, digital retailing, and CDP platforms, while growing its Data as a Service (DaaS) offerings.

Internship Details

The individual will serve as an expert contributor within the S&P Global engineering team, which possesses extensive domain and technical knowledge across all asset classes. The team boasts diverse experience with various technology stacks. Each member of the engineering team plays a key role in providing leadership, fostering innovation, ensuring timely delivery, and effectively articulating business value.

Role and Responsibilities

  • Full Stack Developer – Develop end-to-end solutions that prioritize user satisfaction, performance, and scalability. Worked on UI framework like React, Angular and C# applications.
  • C# Developer – Design, implement and maintain C# based applications that meet high-performance standards.

Qualifications

  • Demonstrated experience in the above-mentioned specific technologies relevant to the role.
  • Commitment to creating inclusive and accessible solutions.
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills.
  • Passion for learning and staying up to date with industry trends.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

How to Apply?

Interested candidates can apply here!

Location

  • Gurgaon, Haryana.
  • Hybrid Mode: twice a week work from the office.
  • Shift time: 12 pm to 9 pm IST

Duration

Contractual role of 12 months.

Deadline

The application deadline is March 31, 2025!

Click here to view the official notification for the Software Development Apprenticeship at Automotive Mastermind, Gurgaon.
